```{r}
library(gtsummary)
v1_usable_cases |> 
  mutate(Stage_3plus = 
      if_else(
        `FXTAS Stage` %in% c(3:5),
        "3+",
        "0-2") |> 
      labelled::set_label_attribute("FXTAS Stage")) |>  
  select(Gender, Stage_3plus) |> 
  gtsummary::tbl_summary(
    by = Stage_3plus,
    percent = "row") |> 
  gtsummary::modify_header(all_stat_cols() ~ "**{level}**, N={n} ({style_percent(p)}%)") |> 
  gtsummary::add_overall() |> 
  gtsummary::modify_spanning_header(c("stat_1", "stat_2") ~ "**FXTAS Stage**")
```
